summary: A Latina working in Los Angeles as a messenger is randomly discovered and fashioned into a pop music star.
cast: Sean Patrick Flanery|Camille Guaty|Alanna Ubach|Jack Plotnick|Udo Kier|Carmen Electra|Lucy Gallardo|Seidy Lopez|Elias Lucero|Keith Robinson|Lauren Tom|Scott Stapp|Mary Stein|Lupe Ontiveros|Mindy Sterling|Sybil Azur|R.A. Buck|Federico Dordei|Jordan Green|Ray Gallegos|John Jacquet Jr.|Tanee McCall|Ashley Roberts|David Shackelford|Lindsey Stoddart|Michon Suyama|Carmen Twillie|Bernardo Verdugo|Karen Yum|Matthew Corbett Davis|Nick Drago|Cameron Lee|Scott Weisman
title: 30 Days Until I'm Famous
